field.name: summary
field.value: Add basic support for ErrorMessage and FriendlyName with .net resource backed localization

field.name: description
field.value:
This feature allow to store localized validation messages declared in validation attributes
The approach is the simplest possible, but may be extended later if localization components emerge in Castle.Core
the patch contains some test cases to illustrate fallback and localization support behaviour,
only AbstractValidationAttribute was touched, all remaining code and tests are untouched (appart a warning).

comment.author: roelofb
comment.text: Looks good. I think AbstractValidationAttribute.GetLocalizedMessageByKey() should throw if the resources cannot be found though.
